data.name: Simple Farm
data.detailed_description:
My new game, Cozy Cabin, is now available to Wishlist!

-

Now with turrets! Grow plants and build guns to fight off daily waves of invading fireflies after a cataclysmic event wipes out the sun!

Start off on a small island in the middle of nowhere. A terrible event has wiped out the sun. You’ll have to build lights to grow crops as the island slowly expands, and use those crops to make guns to ward off the fireflies that are attracted to your light.

Simple Farm started as a little prototype farming sim, and I released it as such, but it has since grown into a project that I’m really invested in. I can’t wait for your feedback!

data.short_description: Craft lights and grow your farm after a cataclysmic event wipes out the sun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 + Windows 10
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
